This fits very small and the material has no stretch to it. Otherwise it’s very cute!
Bad quality it’s  thin  and see through

This shirt is super cute. The material is really similar to the polyester SHEIN material… but it’s not too bad. A tiny bit see through but I would just wear it with a nude bra. It fits super nice, and is super comfy. For reference, I am 5’3 123lbs, 26 waist and got a size small.
Too see through to wear with a bra or bra less
great quality and adjustable straps. very impressive for the low price! pretty thin and vivid color.
See through, but clear cute design

This tank top is on the silky side, a little stretchy and has adjustable straps. Depending on how short you adjust the straps, you can make the neckline lower or higher. This does affect how cropped or not the tank is so you have some options for styling this or wearing with different bras.  The flower print is pretty nice quality, a little abstract but mostly realistic art and not badly printed. The color is black but because the fabric has sheen to it, it looks closer to navy blue depending on the lighting. I really like this shirt and wore it immediately. It does have late nineties-early 2000s vibes.

I couldn't decide so I got two colors! I think the white one could be so perfect for a vacation lunch and the black for dinner! The material is very soft, stretchy and comfortable. I believe the tops can be dressed up or down! I love the flowers and how bright and vibrant they are!

Just as described.  Wasn’t sure about the sizing so I sized up and ordered a large.  Perfect fit.  The straps are adjustable and the material keels nice. It sits just a little below the waist. Glad I ordered the white and the shipping was fast.

This shirt is very stretchy, but also pretty short. It's pretty and very lightweight, which is nice. Thankfully, I have a short torso, so it fits me well, but if you are taller and/or have a long torso, not sure how it'll work unless you like more crop style tanks.  I really like it, so it'll get lots of use by me. The pink flower contrasted against the black background is very pretty.
this top runs so tight and slim fitting, no room for stretch. It’s also a shimmery texture, not e tacky what I thought it’d be.

I bought this to go with the Anthropogie silk cargo pants I'm wearing in photo. I was having trouble finding something that looked good with them and think this top works well. The fabric and fit make it ok to wear without a bra, though nipples-when-cold can been seen easily without the extra layer.
